name: Tanmatsuban
description:
Tanmatsuban (端末番) is a light-weight Sokoban-inspired puzzle game with 45 puzzles to solve. Levels ramp up in difficulty and complexity as you progress and introduce new mechanics and block types along the way. Do you have what it takes to solve them all?

To those interested, the Python source code for Tanmatsuban is open source. You can find the GitLab repository here.

If you're well and truly stumped on a puzzle, you can check out ZooksterGaming's playlist with solutions for each level. It's more rewarding to figure them out yourself though!
